author: GamingBolt
description:
Once Upon a Katamari isn’t just another remaster or remake of an older title, but the first new console entry since 2011. The quirky arcade-puzzler returns with its signature ball rolling mayhem, now wrapped in a time-traveling premise. 

It’s up to the Prince to roll through different eras collecting objects, people, and whatever else gets in his way to put time back together. The era-hopping structure lets players roll across themed stages, from ancient civilizations to futuristic skylines, each packed with new objects and strange surprises to collect. 

It’s classic Katamari, just bigger and more varied than ever. Once Upon a Katamari is available now on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, PC, and Nintendo Switch for $39.99 and you’re not going to want to miss it if you’re a fan of the series.
title: The Most Fun Game of 2025 You'll Likely Never Play [Once Upon a Katamari Review]

author: GamingBolt
description:
With nearly 265,000 peak concurrent players on Steam before the weekend and glowing praise from its currently 9,600 user reviews, Embark Studios' ARC Raiders has made quite the impact on release. 

The Rust Belt offers numerous attractions, from sand-filled city ruins to mountain passes, and plenty of dangers. With how risky and stressful the gameplay can be, here are 15 tips and tricks for ultimately surviving, and perhaps even thriving in your journey of resistance.
title: Arc Raiders - 15 Things It Doesn't Tell You

author: GamingBolt
description:
The Xbox Series X stands as a testament to how far console gaming visuals have evolved with this generation. Thanks to great raw graphical grunt and cutting-edge architecture, developers have been able to develop worlds that feel more alive, immersive, and visually breathtaking than ever before. 

From the gritty realism of shooters to the hand-crafted charm of stylized adventures, the console’s library is packed with games that look like stunning works of art. Be it through the use of cutting-edge rendering solutions or just strong art direction or even a mixture of the two, the Xbox Series X has no shortage of stunning releases.

In this video, we highlight 20 of the most visually stunning games on Xbox Series X.
title: 20 Graphically Mind-Blowing Xbox Series X Games You Need To See To Believe [2025 Edition]
